inn1.comm: floated up, half volley outside off, bit of a loosener, cover driven immaculately to the boundary
bends his back, length ball, Noor Ali beaten outside off
full, played gently to cover
tucked off his hips for an easy one
full, on leg, flicked away square
misses with the pull and the ball thuds perilously close to the groin. Batsman bent over in agony out there, physio Azeem rushes on
full, on off, square driven
pitched on leg, driven to mid on, no run
full, on off, on driven, head over the ball
full, on off, dug out, one bounce to cover
CHANCE, climbs off a length sharply, takes the edge, chest high a foot to the 'keeper's right, gets glove on it
full, tip and run to cover
on a length, back foot defense
fullish length, outside off, glance-cut to third man
wild heave Karim Sadiq-style, coming down the wicket, misses
driven on the up through mid-off, don't need to be crazy when you can play like that
full, on middle, clean strike to send the ball one bounce over the rope in front of the sightscreen
full, bit of width, Noor Ali opens the face and drives between point and cover
on a length outside off, Noor Ali rides the bounce to effect a back foot push square of the wicket
opens his stance, steps down - a Karim Sadiq disciple today is Usman - drives to cover
angles a length delivery to third man
on a length, rising into the ribs, played down
beaten outside off, the keeper standing up to the stumps now to stop those charges down the wicket
wide of off, keeper takes well
full, edged wide of slip, third man does well
back of a length outside off, cut hard but straight to backward point
slower ball, almost foxes the batsman, played away to cover
slower one again, on leg, played to mid on
full, on leg, hurries back for the second
there's that spot on a length which Naveed is finding that's making Noor Ali hurry into a backfoot defence
just a hint of a false stroke, bowler in anguish, Noor Ali takes one to third man with an angled bat drive
back of a length, tucked off his hips to square leg
on a length, played to mid on
hustles through again, not optimum timing with that back-foot drive
on a length on off, played square
full, again no timing with the drive, bowler fields to his right
slingier delivery, on off, played to mid-off
slower delivery, on middle and leg, played gently back down the track. The first maiden of the innings
back of a length, climbing into the ribs, defended
fuller, tapped to mid-off, hurries through
fullish, on the pads, played to mid on
short, lost his run-up the bowler, and pulled round over deep backward square
short outside off this time and upper cut over 'keeper and slip, five feet over their reach
hint of inswing, tucked off the legs behind square
length ball on off, Noor Ali times the backfoot drive but straight to point
genuine play and miss outside off
that slower ball, Noor Ali forward in defense
full on off, pushed to the bowler's left
looking for those inswingers, just a bit of movement, Noor Ali forward in defense
tossed right up, played back down the track
full, played to point
full and played to the bowler's right
giving it lots of air, Usman not tempted
fuller and not so much air, flat-bat drive to point
off-cutter, back of a length, played to mid-off
a little bit of width, tapped to point
length, on middle, played to mid on
bit of width outside off, slashed hard and backward point down to it slowly, ball races away
full, driven back to the bowler's left
on a length, punched back down the track
driven to long-off
play and miss
wide and cut square
full toss, driven to mid-off
wide outside off, cut to short third man
full, driven to long off
driven to mid-off's left
tossed up, driven back to the bowler's left, good effort in his follow-through to save a run
lot of work on that one, really fizzing down to Usman, driven square
flighted, lands on leg, driven gently to mid-on for a single. UAE not the most intimidating in the field when it comes to stopping singles
full, driven to long-off
a little slow through the air, Noor Ali just pushes it to the bowler's left and sets off for an easy one
tossed up on leg, driven crisply, Irfan down well at mid-on
short and outside off, cut away to extra cover
full and driven on the bounce to cover
on a length, hint of turn, played off the back foot down the track
driven to long off, ambled run
full and driven square, Afghanistan not trying anything over the top, playing each ball on its merits and content to milk the singles to set a platform
worked off the pads but can't beat the field
short and asking for it, rocks back to send the ball soaring over vacant midwicket. That's his second fifty in two days
full, driven to mid-on, Irfan down well
driven to long on
tossed up, driven gently to mid-off
on a length, driven to cover
full, driven back to the bowler.
a little short, rocks back to cut, straight to point
tucked off his legs
short and cut to deep extra
full, driven to long on
full, driven to mid-off
tucked off the pads to the leg-side gap, mid on runs in
back of a length, punched off the back foot to long off
quicker through the air, played off the back foot
defended to point
KP-like, down on one knee to hit inside out over mid-off
short and wide and cut away to deep extra who runs to his left on the boundary's edge and sends in a good flat throw
works a back of a length ball to mid-on, decides against the single
beaten in the flight, on middle, pops up short of mid-on, Khurram anguished
more zip on that delivery, Noor Ali drives a little uncertainly
on the pads, clipped away
beaten in the flight again, footwork a tangle and the ball ends up in Khurram's safe hands
on the money, ball one
full, on off, pushed to long off
a little short, played off the back foot to cover
width, flat-batted to cover
tossed right up, driven to long on
tossed up in temptation, driven to long off
short and wide and cut hard, extra cover dives over it
worked off his pads, throw comes in from a lumbering Irfan, batsman would have been in trouble if the fielder had been quicker
that's Noor Ali's first ODI 50
tucked off the pads backward of square
tossed right up, on off, driven to long-off
big outside edge, down to third man
tries to sweep a full delivery, misses, big appeal, going down leg in the judgement of Buddhi Pradhan
that one turns the other way, Rahmat Shah plays round it, and Buddhi Pradhan no hesitation this time
A big blow! Noor Ali just lifts that back leg, good work by Swapnil and Afghanistan from cruising are now being bruised
Sami miscues the drive with that strong bottom hand of his, one bounce to backward point
the ability to make runs out of nothing is Sami's forte and he does it again, scampering a run from an inside-out drive
back of a length and played off the back foot
full and played back to the bowler
full, tries to work it away to leg but misses!
on a length and spinning in, Nabi a little cramped in defence
forward in defence, Khurram probing away
full, driven to mid on
played back to the bowler
dropped short, back foot drive to long on to get off the mark
forward to scotch any spin, played to cover point
squirts off the outer half of the bat, Raza screams in disappointment
played to mid on
back of a length and worked away to midwicket
full, driven back down the track
flighted on a length, bounces, Nabi taps square, Sami late to respond but all safe enough in the end

done in the flight again, ball pops up off a leading edge, being Nabi it's quite an edge and Fayyaz at long-off doesn't make much of an effort at all, ball coming into his hands on the bounce, and Khurram is fuming!
fuming even more now, that's paddled away to fine leg with another typically impudent Sami stroke
driven to long on
back of a length delivery is met on the back foot with a drive to long on
fired in flat, big appeal for lbw
forward, ball squirts off the outer half of the bat
square driven to cover point
worked off the pads to square leg inside the circle
full on middle, pushed away
driven to long off, ambled run
play and miss outside off, there's grip in them thar grasses
short and wide, flat-bat drive to deep extra
authoritative cut to a back of a length delivery, extra cover has to run hard to cut off the boundary to his right
good stroke, driven wide of long-on's left hand, Nabi's class revealed
fizzes away from a length, batsman beaten
given plenty of air, tapped down at the top of the bounce to short third man
cut through the infield
tossed up, played to midwicket inside the circle
full, driven hard from middle, Khurram down well at cover to save
full, played away to midwicket
tossed up on off, driven to cover
nudged off the pads backward of square
down leg, as the batsman misses with the paddle
driven to long on
short and Sami rocks back to swat away to midwicket
plenty of air from Fayyaz again, Nabi unsure whether to stick or twist
CHANCE! Shimmies down to send a flat skimmer straight down Amjad's throat at long on and its shelled. For a former national wicket-keeper that's an unlikely drop.
plays and misses outside off
full, driven to cover's right
Sami top edges the sweep but lands in front of fine leg who fumbles anyway
Sami waits on a flighted delivery to push to mid-off
shin-high full toss, Nabi picks his spot to bisect long off and extra cover.
back of a length, punched off the back foot to long off
held back just a touch, Sami pushes back down the track
tossed up, driven to the bowler's left, who fields
pushed away to md-on
powered away, almost Dhoni-esquely, a full delivery on off played wide of long on's right
full, tapped to mid-on, quick single
forward to drive a length ball, cover's in the way
full and on middle, bottom-handed away on the bounce past the bowler's right hand
one clean swing of the bat, one clean six over the long-off boundary
opens the shoulders to drive along the ground to long-off's left
driven to midwicket
full and driven to long-off's left, controlled aggression from Nabi here
tip and run from Sami
straight-driven sight-screen denter. Stroke of immense power
in the slot and just heaved over the midwicket rope. And that's his fifth ODI 50
Nabi's worked out that Karate's got just the one delivery and every pitched-up delivery that's angling in is being hammered through the leg side
back of a length on off and that's driven to wide long-off
just a little short, just a little wide, one heck of a lot of distance on that pull over midwicket
full, driven, one bounce to mid-on inside the circle
Naveed tries a short one, Sami pulls behind square
full, looking for that leg-cutter, driven to mid-on
blockhole delivery, jammed out to mid-off
wide full toss, Nabi slices wide of backward point
full on off and middle, hit high and inside out, long-off can't reach it
short, doesn't come through as quickly as Nabi expected, misses with the pull
trampoline bounce to one dug in
down leg
short on off, swung round on the bounce to midwicket
yorker-length, squeezed out to midwicket and good running gives them two
short, spliced pull over the shoulder races down to vacant fine leg

CATCH! It's Amjad who takes the difficult one, running to his left to intercept a certain 6 at long-on. 8 overs and 61 runs in between the first much easier chance Nabi gave him and Amjad knows it, throwing the ball away in anger after taking the catch.
attempted sweep, dribbles off the pad
down leg and they take a run too
leg-stump line from Raza, swept away to square leg
full toss, juicy as you like and its cracked away over long on, the sound audible through plate glass 80-yards away
back of a length, sits up, Shafiq gets under it and it goes soaring over midwicket
50 for Sami wiith that lofted drive whcih evades Amjad's dive to his right running in from long-off
short and helped round the corner, the Afghan fans at Kinrara have had plenty to cheer in the last hour
making runs out of nothing at all Sami, on a length on middle and flat-batted straight past the bowler to the sightscreen
hammered hard through, past and beyond long on
'just' a single to mid-on
on a length, sits up and short-arm swatted over long on, legs, arms, bat all on the up as Sami connected
played to mid on
full, driven to long off
that Samiullah reverse-sweep!
down the wicket to manufacture a full-toss, on the bounce to long on
It ends with a dot but Afghanistan have peppered the boundaries in the past 20 overs.

inn2.comm: left-armer to left-hander, on a length, forward and played away square
on a length, holds its line, and just past the outside edge
full, on leg, clipped away
on a length, past the outside edge
attempted yorker, takes the pad
short, rises with the bounce to clip away past point
length ball, thuds into the thigh pad
another wicket to wicket delivery, hint of inside edge and that stifles the lbw appeal
down leg
slingier-actioned delivery, wide and short outside off, batsman shoulders arms
tapped away square
full, aimed at middle, forward in defense
forward to drive wide of cover
comes up off a length, plenty of time to play away to backward point from the top of the bounce
full, turned away to mid-on
Dawlat increasingly round-arm these days, this one swings in to the left-hander, appeal for lbw
another one that thuds into the pads from a full-length
daring stroke, full on middle and just flicked away, all eye and wrist in front of square leg. Amjad playing with a lot of confidence
fullish length, on off, angled away to third man
short and wide, cut away to wide third man
yorker-length on leg-stump, clipped to square leg
on one knee to drive, straight to cover
waits on a length delivery to turn it round to backward square
looking for that yorker, flicked away to fine leg
striving for that yorker lbw is Shapoor
another one aimed at the base of leg-stump, turned away to square leg
on a length, defended
swing there, a big play and miss outside off
full, wide of off, driven in the air but wide of a diving Sami's left hand at point
solid defense to a good length delivery
full, in the block hole, big appeal for lbw. Shapoor fast before, furious after
full, on leg, turned away
back of a length on off-stump, played to point
length ball turned away to backward square with the angle, Aftab fields, sends in a good throw to the keeper's end, batsman just home with a dive
another attempted yorker, jammed out
stays a bit low outside off
defended to cover
angled bat stroke to a good length delivery outside off, third man fields
tries the leg-cutter, batsman defends
on a length, defended
short, cut away to third man
full, takes the pads
the doosra almost does him! Maybe too high and doing too much
fizzes past the outside edge with that one
full and squeezed away behind point by Salman
turns and beats the outside edge
forward to defend
full, on the pads
stroke! Length delivery outside off lashed away square, point gets a hand to it but that was hit very hard
defended down the track
clipped away to third man
length delivery, on middle, driven firmly with a turn of the wrists to mid-on
turns into the pads
full, driven to long on
forward to push-drive, mid-off runs in
full and defended
tossed up teasingly, defended
quicker delivery, Amjad shimmies down and hits in the air through long-on, good stroke
full, defended, no real sign of any swing for Mirwais
going for line and length, ball's tapped away to the off-side
shot maan! Touch of the West Indies about that on-the-up drive through mid-off
on off, defended
tip and run to the off-side
forward, and played to point
tries a reverse-paddle
full, defended
just a little short and pulled round to midwicket with a lot of wrist
tries a sweep, no real connection
defended to the off-side
full and driven to mid-on without the best timing
full on middle and defended to the off-side
doesn't quite time that pull either, ball almost bouncing on to the stumps
fullish length, into the pads
a batsman is beaten for the first time in quite a while
flicked down to fine leg
driven to midwicket
tossed up on off, driven to long-off

just a bit more loop on that one, lands outside off, takes the thick outside edge as an ambitious drive's attempted and Dawlat at backward point inside the circle clutches the ball chest high coming in
full on off, played square
looking for a single close in, no chance
yorker-length, dug out
full, played to point
full, sweetly driven to extra cover
tapped to cover who was on the circle markers and sets off straight away, home easily
class stroke from a classy player, nothing too wrong with the delivery, just driven where he wanted wide of cover
stroked away effortlessly past cover
beaten in the flight and that's a huge blow, Shaiman Anwar is the UAE's best batsman
kept low, ball skidding through and that's a big wicket, Swapnil was the in-form batsman
forward to defend
full-length delivery, driven to mid-off, scampers through
full, on leg, flicked away
full, in the slot, powered away to long-off
fired in flat, defended
full, flicked away to square leg, another quick one taken
loops it down on a length, defended with soft hands
fullish length, tossed up, lands on middle and sent soaring over midwicket, two bounces over the rope
half volley outside off stroked away beautifully through cover, fine way to reach 50. Khurram gives Amjad a hug and a 'keep going' out in the middle
lands on leg and driven to long on
rides the bounce to tap down to third man
drops the ball on leg stump, Amjad hoists it away over square leg
delicate touch  he has as well Amjad, paddles this one fine all the way, torments the fielder all the way even beyond the dive
flicked away to square leg
all the tip and run could lead to a run-out eventually, until it does, UAE are going to keep the scoreboard moving and frustrating the bowlers
square driven and Usman does well with the boot, covering 30 yards on the extra cover boundary
short and pulled away to the man at deep square leg
length delivery worked off the hip to that man at square leg
long hop outside off to start, Khurram hits straight to cover and is disappointed
no room for error against Amjad today
pushed gently to mid on, sound batting, slams those that deserve to be, makes runs from as many of the others as possible
the arch scoreboard mover Khurram keeps on rolling along, this partnership going at better than a run a ball
length delivery on middle worked away to the leg side
same again
faster and flatter, defended
fired in on leg stump, whipped away to square leg
shuffles back, comes forward, misses with the cut
cuts hard to point who parries, Amjad had come down the track quite a way, sent back, beats the throw to Nabi
reverse sweeps well
fired in to leg stump and flicked away fine, with interest
tip and run to mid on inside the circle, direct hit at the bowler's end, that must have been close!
forward to defend
full, on the pads, flicked away
struggling for rhythm Shapoor today (and yesterday) lands on leg stump, nudged away
length ball on off, defended
plays down the wrong line, and he's out! Spun a couple of inches past the forward defensive bat and that's a huge wicket, a hundred and more looked on for Amjad.
pitches outside leg, keeps low, big heave across the line against the spinning ball and it tickles leg stump on the way through
spins away from middle to off
full on leg, played to square leg
Khurram forward to drive to mid on
bouncer outside off, Karate sways his head out of line
back of a length, chopped to Sami at cover, just beats the throw at the bowler's end, direct hit may have had him
full on leg, flicked away
length delivery on off, defended
tossed right up, Khurram drives to midwicket along the ground
a little short, square cut to third man
flighted to land in the blind spot on middle and leg, defended accordingly
turns and bounces from middle to off, Shafiq takes above the waist
length ball thuds into the pads, big appeal, inside edge saves Khurram
not looking too sound out there is the batsman, but he remains
tossed up outside off, Khurram slices the attempted big shot over mid on and short third man takes.
length delivery, played with soft hands
tries the sweep, doesn't connect cleanly
connects this time, Sami puts in a good dive at fine leg moving to his left on the boundary's edge
short, slice-cut, Shapoor dives over it at short third man
back of a length and tucked off the hip
bouncer! Goes for the hook, gloved to Shafiq who takes with his arms above his head
full toss outside off, pushed away into the offside gap
full, on the stumps, defended
length delivery, leans back to drive, backward point fields
tossed up onto middle, driven to mid-off
flighted again, takes the leading edge of the attempted drive, goes high to mid-off who bags safely
down leg
down leg
miscues an attempted pull, balls drops close in
slower ball, on leg, appeal for lbw not given
inside edge from a big heave, a yard wide of the 'keeper
short and angled away to third man
clears the front leg and heaves a flighted delivery over long on
spins and bounces from off
swatted away to midwicket
classic leg-break, pitches on leg and middle and beats the outside edge
another one that goes past the edge, slip takes to his left
on-driven, good stroke!
pulls a short ball where square leg waits beneath it
zips past the outside edge of the forward defensive
fires in that yorker, appeals but there was bat on it
another yorker-length delivery, withstood
full, down leg
pops up off the hip
those yorkers are not getting through
full again, driven to mid-off who fumbles allowing the second
attempted sweep, off the pad

miscues the drive off the half volley, takes the outer half of the bat, short cover Sami dives forward and to his right, takes the ball inches off the ground, umpire Sarika Prasad confers with his colleague Buddhi Pradhan at square leg before raising the finger and Afghanistan have won by 70 runs
